metadata.synopsis: In this dialog the player can make a magma mephit appear that when answered correctly will breathe fire on a letter, turning it into a powerful magical scroll. The language the mephit speaks is called Ignan and can be spoken as the words appear – simply think away the many apostrophes. In the actor context are the approximations of what the mephit is saying so that the tone can be matched to the content.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. recruit Gale4. Kill gale5. Loot the pouch on his body6. Open the pouch with Gale's instruction and take the flute7. Play the flute

45.speaker: Narrator
45.text: *Now that K'ha'ssji'trach'ash has done his duty, the flute's duty too has been fulfilled.*

57.speaker: Narrator
57.text: *This is the flute Gale kept on his person. A faint magical aura envelops its wooden surface.*
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player holds a small, magical flute.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: Try to play a little ditty.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player plays a little tune on the flute. It sounds great!

28.speaker: Flute
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player plays a little tune on the flute. It sounds great!

92.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player plays a little tune on the flute. It sounds great!

30.speaker: Shadowheart
30.text: Pretty tune. You're better with your mouth than I would have figured.

4.speaker: Karlach
4.text: Handsome and talented. Goodness me, I'm a goner.

14.speaker: Astarion
14.text: Bravo! I didn't think you had it in you.

0.text: Enough. I've heard sweeter sounds from a dying vrock.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player plays a little tune on the flute. It sounds awful.

69.text: Enough. I've heard sweeter sounds from a dying vrock.

89.speaker: Flute

23.speaker: Shadowheart

23.context: NodeContext: Spoken with a wince - the player's efforts on a flute are less than harmonious.

9.speaker: Karlach
9.context: NodeContext: Spoken with a wince - the player's efforts on a flute are less than harmonious.

85.speaker: Astarion
85.text: Just be grateful that my ears can't bleed.

15.speaker: Wyll
15.text: Ah, yes, that classic tune: 'Ode to a Shrieking Owlbear'.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Play the tune again that will summon the mephit.

22.speaker: Player
